name.baseName: Municipal wastewater treatment ; Wastewater ; Vertical-loop reactor activated sludge technology
市政污水处理; 污水 ;立式环流反应器活性污泥技术

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Vertical circulating reactor activated sludge technology is an advanced wastewater treatment technology, in which activated sludge is fully contacted and reacted with wastewater through a vertical circulation system. This technology effectively utilizes the space inside the reactor, improves wastewater treatment efficiency, and is suitable for treating all types of wastewater, including municipal and industrial wastewater.
立式环流反应器活性污泥技术是一种先进的废水处理技术，通过立式循环系统将活性污泥与废水充分接触反应。这种技术有效利用了反应器内的空间，提高了废水处理效率，适用于处理各类污水，包括城市和工业污水。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: Vertical Cyclone Reactor activated sludge technology typically involves the following key processes:Intake and mixing: Wastewater is introduced into the Vertical Cyclone Reactor and mixed thoroughly with the activated sludge.Biodegradation: Organic substances in the wastewater are degraded by microorganisms into water and carbon dioxide.Circulation: Through the vertical circulation system, the wastewater and activated sludge are continuously contacted and mixed to promote the degradation of organic substances in the wastewater.Sedimentation: The treated water is settled in the reactor so that sludge particles are deposited to the bottom to form sludge deposits.Clean Water Discharge: Treated water is discharged through an outlet and clean water is released into the environment.
立式环流反应器活性污泥技术通常包含以下几个关键过程：进水和混合：废水被引入立式环流反应器，并与活性污泥充分混合。生物降解：废水中的有机物质被微生物降解成水和二氧化碳。循环：通过垂直循环系统，使废水和活性污泥持续接触和混合，促进废水中的有机物质降解。沉淀：处理后的水在反应器中沉淀，使污泥颗粒沉积到底部形成污泥沉积物。清水排放：经过处理后的水通过出水口排放，清洁水被释放到环境中。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The described vertical-loop reactor activated sludge technology is utilized for municipal wastewater treatment processes. This technology is specifically applied in the treatment of wastewater by using a vertical-loop reactor configuration to promote effective breakdown of organic pollutants through activated sludge. It's typically employed in municipal wastewater treatment facilities to ensure clean water standards suitable for either discharge into natural water bodies or for further purification stages.
所描述的立式环流反应器活性污泥技术用于市政污水处理过程。该技术特别适用于使用立式环流反应器配置来促进通过活性污泥有效分解有机污染物的废水处理。它通常用于市政污水处理设施，以确保清洁水标准适合排放到自然水体或进一步净化阶段。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Polruang, S., Sirivithayapakorn, S. & Prateep Na Talang, R. A comparative life cycle assessment of municipal wastewater treatment plants in Thailand under variable power schemes and effluent management programs. Journal of Cleaner Production 172, 635–648 (2018).

Polruang, S., Sirivithayapakorn, S. & Prateep Na Talang, R. A comparative life cycle assessment of municipal wastewater treatment plants in Thailand under variable power schemes and effluent management programs. Journal of Cleaner Production 172, 635–648 (2018).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this dataset for Life Cycle Assessment, attention should be given to the specific context in which the vertical-loop reactor activated sludge technology is applied, including the year of implementation and the geographical location (Nongkaem, Thailand, 2014). Considerations such as local ambient conditions and technological variations should be accounted for. Any updates or changes in the technology or regional wastewater standards subsequent to 2014 should be taken into account for accurate assessment.
在使用此数据集进行生命周期评估时，应注意立式环流反应器活性污泥技术应用的具体背景，包括实施年份和地理位置（泰国农艺，2014年）。应考虑当地环境条件和技术变化等因素。任何2014年后技术或区域污水标准的更新或变化都应考虑在内，以确保评估的准确性。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
